Package shapes3d.animation

Class Summary
AbstractVectorChangeAction Abstract class that can be used to interpolate between 2 PVector objects over a given time.
Camera Base class for all camera types provided by Shapes3D
OrbitCam A very basic camera that can orbit a particular position in 3D space as specified by the lookAt vector.
ShapeMover Class to cause a shape to move from one position to another over a fixed time period and after an optional delay start time.
ShapeRotator Class to cause a shape to rotate from one orientation to another over a fixed time period and after an optional delay start time.
StopWatch Simple implementation of a timer that records the current and the lap time (in seconds).
TerrainCam This class provides a simple camera that can be used with the Terrain class.
VCam This class provides a very simple 'portable video camera' that can me moved at a processor independent speed.
